slide.title: Autoload
slide.example:
<?php
function __autoload( $className )
{
	$path = preg_replace( '/([A-Z])/', '/\\1', $className );
	$path = strtolower( $path );
	$path = str_replace( 'ezc/', '', $path ) . '.php';
	echo "Loading $path...\n";
	@include_once $path;
}

$a = new ezcMailSmtpTransport;
?>
